title: Project Skins : Ashe, Katarina and ekko.
body:
Hey guys. I've been looking forward to getting the new project skins for {{champion:55}}  and {{champion:245}} , and I was just wondering if anyone knows of the date of release.
If its already been posted could I please have a link.
Thanks.

replies.body:
Mm yeah usually they release the skins a day after the patch so it is very unusual of Riot to release them so late. Hopefully tomorrow!

Definitely gonna buy that Ekko skin it looks soooooo cool.
I got a virus at the perfect time (or so I thought). Was hoping for 2-3 days of playing with the project skins and still nothing. Very dissappointed.
I know. Its frustrating when Riot takes forever to release shit to the live servers. I don't even care if the skins are a bit buggy, I just want to play robot Ekko!!!
They usually do it Friday or Saturday more accurately.
